channel.title: CVE Feed for ZTE -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ZTE -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-7357|2024-08-05T06:24:12.002Z -- zte -- zxhn%20h168n
item.description: ZTE ZXHN H168N product with versions V2.2.0_PK1.2T5, V2.2.0_PK1.2T2, V2.2.0_PK11T7 and V2.2.0_PK11T have an improper access control vulnerability, which may allow an unauthorized user to gain unauthorized access.

item.title: CVE-2018-7363|2024-08-05T06:24:12.021Z -- zte -- zxhn%20f670
item.description: All versions up to V1.1.10P3T18 of ZTE ZXHN F670 product are impacted by improper authorization vulnerability. Since appviahttp service has no authorization delay, an attacker can be allowed to brute force account credentials.

item.title: CVE-2018-7358|2024-08-05T06:24:11.858Z -- zte -- zxhn%20h168n
item.description: ZTE ZXHN H168N product with versions V2.2.0_PK1.2T5, V2.2.0_PK1.2T2, V2.2.0_PK11T7 and V2.2.0_PK11T have an improper change control vulnerability, which may allow an unauthorized user to perform unauthorized operations.

item.title: CVE-2018-7361|2024-08-05T06:24:12.047Z -- zte -- zxhn%20f670
item.description: All versions up to V1.1.10P3T18 of ZTE ZXHN F670 product are impacted by null pointer dereference vulnerability, which may allows an attacker to cause a denial of service via appviahttp service.

item.title: CVE-2018-7359|2024-08-05T06:24:11.888Z -- zte -- zxhn%20f670
item.description: All versions up to V1.1.10P3T18 of ZTE ZXHN F670 product are impacted by heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2018-7362|2024-08-05T06:24:11.938Z -- zte -- zxhn%20f670
item.description: All versions up to V1.1.10P3T18 of ZTE ZXHN F670 product are impacted by improper access control vulnerability, which may allows an unauthorized user to perform unauthorized operations on the router.

item.title: CVE-2018-7366|2024-08-05T06:24:11.870Z -- zte -- zxv10%20b860av2.1_chinamobile
item.description: ZTE ZXV10 B860AV2.1 product ChinaMobile branch with the ICNT versions up to V1.3.3, the BESTV versions up to V1.2.2, the WASU versions up to V1.1.7 and the MGTV versions up to V1.4.6 have an authentication bypass vulnerability, which may allows an unauthorized user to perform unauthorized operations.

item.title: CVE-2018-7364|2024-08-05T06:24:11.900Z -- zte -- zxin10-european%20region
item.description: All versions up to ZXINOS-RESV1.01.43 of the ZTE ZXIN10 product European region are impacted by improper access control vulnerability. Due to improper access control to devcomm process, an unauthorized remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with root privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-7360|2024-08-05T06:24:11.935Z -- zte -- zxhn%20f670
item.description: All versions up to V1.1.10P3T18 of ZTE ZXHN F670 product are impacted by information exposure vulnerability, which may allow an unauthenticated attacker to get the GPON SN information via appviahttp service.

item.title: CVE-2018-7356|2024-08-05T06:24:11.880Z -- zte -- zxr10%208905e
item.description: All versions up to V3.03.10.B23P2 of ZTE ZXR10 8905E product are impacted by TCP Initial Sequence Number (ISN) reuse vulnerability, which can generate easily predictable ISN, and allows remote attackers to spoof connections.

item.title: CVE-2018-7365|2024-08-05T06:24:11.865Z -- zte -- usmartview
item.description: All versions up to ZXCLOUD iRAI V5.01.05 of the ZTE uSmartView product are impacted by untrusted search path vulnerability, which may allow an unauthorized user to perform unauthorized operations.

item.title: CVE-2018-7355|2024-08-05T06:24:11.940Z -- zte -- mf65
item.description: All versions up to V1.0.0B05 of ZTE MF65 and all versions up to V1.0.0B02 of ZTE MF65M1 are impacted by cross-site scripting vulnerability. Due to improper neutralization of input during web page generation, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to conduct reflected XSS or HTML injection attacks on the devices.

item.title: CVE-2024-22064|2024-08-01T22:35:34.708Z -- zte -- zxun-epdg
item.description: ZTE ZXUN-ePDG product, which serves as the network node of the VoWifi system, under by default configuration, uses a set of non-unique cryptographic keys during establishing a secure connection(IKE) with the mobile devices connecting over the internet . If the set of keys are leaked or cracked, the user session informations using the keys may be leaked.

item.title: CVE-2024-22062|2024-08-01T22:35:34.788Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a permissions and access control vulnerability in ZXCLOUD IRAI.An attacker can elevate non-administrator permissions to administrator permissions by modifying the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2024-22062|2024-07-09T06:41:07.828Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a permissions and access control vulnerability in ZXCLOUD IRAI.An attacker can elevate non-administrator permissions to administrator permissions by modifying the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-25646|2024-06-20T06:20:44.058Z -- zte -- zxhn%20h388x
item.description: There is an unauthorized access vulnerability in ZTE H388X. If H388X is caused by brute-force serial port cracking,attackers with common user permissions can use this vulnerability to obtain elevated permissions on the affected device by performing specific operations.

item.title: CVE-2024-22064|2024-06-04T17:52:44.293Z -- zte -- zxun-epdg
item.description: ZTE ZXUN-ePDG product, which serves as the network node of the VoWifi system, under by default configuration, uses a set of non-unique cryptographic keys during establishing a secure connection(IKE) with the mobile devices connecting over the internet . If the set of keys are leaked or cracked, the user session informations using the keys may be leaked.

item.title: CVE-2023-25646|2024-06-26T20:10:48.349Z -- zte -- zxhn%20h388x
item.description: There is an unauthorized access vulnerability in ZTE H388X. If H388X is caused by brute-force serial port cracking,attackers with common user permissions can use this vulnerability to obtain elevated permissions on the affected device by performing specific operations.

item.title: CVE-2024-22062|2024-07-09T14:49:04.602Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a permissions and access control vulnerability in ZXCLOUD IRAI.An attacker can elevate non-administrator permissions to administrator permissions by modifying the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-25646|2024-08-02T11:25:19.252Z -- zte -- zxhn%20h388x
item.description: There is an unauthorized access vulnerability in ZTE H388X. If H388X is caused by brute-force serial port cracking,attackers with common user permissions can use this vulnerability to obtain elevated permissions on the affected device by performing specific operations.
